website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality soundbar and wireless subwoofer with Dolby Atmos and advanced technology designed to provide an enhanced listening experience.
pros: This impressive 2.1 soundbar system features a simple HDMI connection and voice enhancement so the dialogue is easier to hear
Additionally, there are seven sound modes, which include movies, music, gaming, and more, to make this a highly versatile sound system
cons: This unit is sometimes promoted as a 7.1.2 sound system, but that is only a simulation
all the sound comes from a 2.1 system (stereo speakers and a subwoofer)

customer_reviews.title: The Soundbar can be intimidating
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new Sony TV; the soundbar was an afterthought. I knew nothing about the Sony soundbar when I purchased the TV so I bought the sound system entirely based on Amazon shoppers recommendations. If you are not computer savvy (like me), then I suggest you get your young nephew or niece to help with the installation of this equipment. Then, fasten your seatbelt, because this makes your TV a cinema or a live sporting event, and a rock concert, with no more effort than pushing a factory pre-set button, which I do, or, you can instruct the entire system to meet your specific audio qualifications.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Mid-Range Option
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT BUY for the price point. I wanted something better than $200-300 options and didn't want to spend $1,100 on Sonos sound bar & subwoofer for a $1,100 TV. Connected easily to my 2 year old Samsung 70" TV. System turns on/off in automatically with TV. System recognizes TV remote for increase/decrease volume. Sound quality outstanding, voices come through very clear. Have not noticed the surround sound as filling the whole room, but that may be movies from Amazon Prime, Netflix are not supplying latest Dolby signals. Be careful about HDMI and optical cables. System comes with 1 HDMI and you made need 2 HDMI or 1 HDMI and 1 optical cable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wire

customer_reviews.title: For small rooms only
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed in the sound quality to be honest,with only two front firing speakers it definitely lacks with needing to ramp up volume to at least half way for movies to sound ok and the sub is useless with it fully turned up you can barely tell it works.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Decent soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Decent soundbar. Atmos movies sound great. I can’t really hear sound bouncing off the ceiling. Voices sound not so great. I am constantly pressing different buttons on the remote to match the content I’m watching to optimize the sound. No real indication that the Vertical S is on. My couch is pretty far from the tv. Maybe 10 or 11 feet. I think the sound would be better if I sat closer to the bar.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quality Quality and extra features.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a bundle deal with the Sony X900. It’s the best bundle deal for a movie lover, and as close to a home theater you could get with only a few key equipment pieces. That aside- the subwoofer automatically connects to the sound bar and the sound bar is super easy to use with the tv. Also, if you haven’t had the chance to experience the customizable sound setting features then you’re missing out. This was well worth the money. I would recommend with or without the tv. Give it a chance and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Medina

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great soundbar for PS4 per 4K pass through using ARC. Sound quality is awesome compared to my prior sound bar. It is moderately priced so is worth the extra money compared to budget models.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good bar, learning curve with sound settings.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 75" Sony TV with the Sony X9000F. The set up to TV is easy, the sound setup has more of a learning curve. You can set distance to tv, db settings for sub/bar (under hdmi advanced settings) and under home you can set sub volume, Dolby, vertical sync and also pre set settings. Once I figured all that out the sound is good. The distance setting made a big difference, before setting volume was set to 35-45, now I'm at 24....35 is really loud now. Thought is was a little expensive, but so far nice equipment, update to new firmware if needed, had 1.51...updated to 2.050.
customer_reviews.author: T. KAY

customer_reviews.title: First Dolby Atmos setup.
customer_reviews.text: A great soundbar paired with OLED C8 and Xbox one x. I have never had to turn it up to the max as about 3/4 is plenty loud for me. As I have this setup in a two car garage. The remote is pretty basic but uncomplicated. The only gripe is when your changing sound or settings, the status bar that is displayed on the tv looks like really old tech.
customer_reviews.author: JAK32

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, lacking mids and hollow sound.
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Vertical sound somehow makes it sound worse. Dolby digital surround is the best mode but still way way too hollow and lacking mids to justify this price point. Build quality is good, but just sounds terrible. I have a 2013 $200 Samsung with better sound. Oh and lip sync issues that wouldn't fix with the on bar settings or TV. There's not many options at this price point for soundbars and unfortunately I'm left still searching for a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Best soundbar for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Found this in Amazon warehouse "open box" at a lesser price. Worth it! All parts were in box and a small, SMALL ding on sound bar that is barely noticeable from only one angle! The warehouse price fit our budget set for a sound bar. Had checked out and compared sound bars at another retail outlet and found this one to be the best, tho above our budget amount. Thanks to warehouse pricing, we were able to have the best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the sound quality and USB playback
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my LG OLED, as this one has Dolby Atmos. The quality of sound for movies etc is meh. The most annoying (lack of feature) is absence of random play for playing music tracks from the USB port. Seriously SONY? I loaded over 700 songs on a USB and decide to use the sound bar for music. Horribly disappointed that everytime you start, you start with song #1 and there is NO random play. Seriously SONY? Hoping that SONY will release a firmware to fix this issue. If it does, it may get one more star, until then, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dhruva

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Nothing special. No way to connect headphones to it easily.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Not a ton of difference between modes as near as I can tell. Probably would’ve been just fine with the cheaper model. Disappointed there’s no easy way to connect BT headphones to it. Bought this bc I have a Sony POS TV which DIED AFTER FIVE DAYS... whole other issue. These days I don’t know if there’s much need to buy same maker as TV.
customer_reviews.author: RBGGGB

customer_reviews.title: connection problem
customer_reviews.text: we had and are again incurring connection problems. we connected it to our Sony tv and it worked fine. we then experienced a comcast interruption and now cannot get it to work again
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Great value but leaves me wanting a little more
customer_reviews.text: Vastly improved the sound over my TV speakers. The Dolby Atmos and DTS works okay but leave me wanting more. If you are looking for a quality sound bar had a great value this is your sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding system
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound bar. Very narrow and thin bar, as always with Sony it looks high quality like it should cost much more. Read several reviews on similar sound bars and it true this one really beats all others for the price range. We have 20ft ceiling so this works great since all speakers face forward. Sub is witless and no lag in sound, it’s spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyboy628

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing system!!! Better than the Bose system I have!!! Bose get to the program!!! Implement Dolby-HD, Atmos among others and stop milking your audio system!!!! Bose wouldn’t like that! Lol...SONY you have stepped it up!!! Great system!!!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound System!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this is unbelievable, and the bass makes you feel like your in the movie theater. The remote lets you control the projection of the bar, as well as the bass, so you can fine tune to the room or your liking. I barely turn it up, and the sound is booming. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Audio Sync
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents last Christmas and for the life of me I STILL cannot appropriately sync the audio. People mouths DO NOT sync with the audio that is being displayed. From optical to HDMI, the feed is not the problem. Next, their is a manual millisecond adjustment you can do to attempt to sync--which only gets it further from where it needs to go. It sucks you out of the experience entirely which is a shame because it does sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Baker

customer_reviews.title: Told the truth, It's terrible !!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible remote !!! Whoever designed this must have TINY hands. It's so small you can't even find the volume buttons, let alone any other features . TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE and on and on and on etc etc etc ~ JUST TERRIBLE !! Oh, I stated that all ready.. Now ask me how I really fell !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sub pairs easily, in fact the bluetooth works great. Having multiple inputs makes this 1 a winner in my book. HDMI, optic, and line level and bluetooth makes it versatile. Sound is great. Has plenty of volume and the sub is clean and clear. Well worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: irishhandyman

customer_reviews.title: Video games hearing people walk movies the song quality and how it bounces off the ceiling and walls
customer_reviews.text: I liked this purchase for the integration with my Sony TV the sound is awesome fits right underneath my 65in TV flush with the screen doesn't interfere with the legs and has great thunder from down under would recommend works in a large room just fine
customer_reviews.author: Brian's

customer_reviews.title: Odd connection issues at times
customer_reviews.text: Over all good, but too often it does not auto connect to Sony Bravia tv. The tv and this bar are supposed to work together but too often you need to find the remote for it to tell tv to connect. Kinda pain. Not so happy with the Sony smart tv. Think it needs more schooling
customer_reviews.author: OVERRULED

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It was flat/tinny at first but with some fiddling and setting adjustment I was able to get good sound. Don’t just experiment with the sound bar settings but also the tv settings. I have a Sony tv so they worked together very well. The sound bar sounds much better below the tv than on top.
customer_reviews.author: NikoBlue

customer_reviews.title: No volume control
customer_reviews.text: The Voice control (auto volume adjust to avoid volume change between dialogue and action scenes) doesn’t work- minimal affect at best. It is better than the TV but for the money spent expected a whole lot more.
customer_reviews.author: max headroom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker bar in attempt to replace my Bose GS II series. The sound was pretty good but the bass unit lacked. The build quality also felt like very cheap plastic was used for the sound bar, the bar itself was hot after watching one movie (1.5 hrs). Worst of all, the system was not compatible with any of my remotes other than it’s own (LG tv).
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had but not great
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to determine when it is on which I find frustrating. You must remember to turn this off!! My other sound bars would turn themselves off after periods of quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It is worth the money. You have to jump up several hundred dollars in price to get a noticeable sound quality difference. Set-up and mounting it were super simple. I'd buy it again. My only complaint is the remote - not that this one is particularly bad, it is just another remote laying around that you need once in awhile. Give me a phone app instead of a remote that I will rarely use.
customer_reviews.author: map1106

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice soundbar with excellent bass. The voice quality could be better. The voices are sometimes still hard to hear over the other audio even with the voice enhancements engaged.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Mills

customer_reviews.title: no instructions
customer_reviews.text: how to use it with tv? No instructions besides online....l am sure I am not using it to full capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep all papers. They are helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! My husband loves it especially when sports are on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound system
customer_reviews.text: Came with my Sony XBR70 830f. It was free. I love it. Sounds great. Easy to set up and operate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it with a new Sony TV. hook up was easy. Sounds great. Hope all stays that way
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Good, but is it worth the money?
customer_reviews.text: Audio from TV dramatically better. Not sure is this really features Atmos. When playing Atmos audio sources I hear no difference in sound placement. Paired with my Sony TV without issue. Using the sound bar as a bluetooth speaker is great.
customer_reviews.author: BD Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound and sound options. Not much the the voice is not sync. Tried to adjust but need more time to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: OUT STANDING CHANGE MY LIFE MY MY NEIGHBORS HATE ME NOT BECAUSE ITS LOUD ITS MY MATCHING SONY 75 INCH TV HA
customer_reviews.author: simon warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soundbar with my Sony TV -- best sound ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 983pl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Bass needs more boost, easy to setup and use. Adjustable sound level presets are ok, not that much different but work fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Read the positive reviews and I'm very happy with my purchase. May need some customizations. I turned off all of the effects and it sounds best that way. Amazing depth and range, and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sound system Dolby Atmos is great and not to mention the sound bar itself is rather slim so it won’t cover your tv.
customer_reviews.author: Boba_Fett08

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound bar. Works beautifully with my Sony tv.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great !
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this item and loves the sound quality !
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Decker

customer_reviews.title: I highly suggest you keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The sound from my $500 TV is way better. I tried every mode and it is garbage on all. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound recreation. Like the vertical feature that creates surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rodd L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: Disgusted. Subwoofer shows up, the back of it has been damaged. And the sound bar itself would crack when id have the volume up to 11. Returning asap. Im sure its great but i suppose i just got unlucky with this.
customer_reviews.author: CLGILL

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a soundbar designed for clear voice but it was lacking full spectrum; this soundbar does both. It has great sound coupled with very clear voice. I am using optical input because i do not really need the upscale audio and I have all of my stuff already plugged into the TV. If you wanted to use HDMI it does seem scarce on inputs, but there are workarounds. I also have a Sony TV so this integrates well with it and is easily controlled by my Logitech remote. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming sounds ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my gaming setup. I couldn't be more pleased. I have also used this to watch movies, and man, this is so much better than buying 7 speakers as it simulates surround. Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

product_meta.title: Sony HT-X9000F Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer: X9000F 2.1ch Dolby Atmos Sound Bar and Subwoofer - Home Theater Surround Sound Speaker System for TV - Bluetooth and HDMI Arc Compatible Bar
product_meta.description: Your audio content comes alive with the 2.1 channel Dolby Atmos/ DTS: x soundbar. The vertical sound engine reproduces sounds that seem to come from above, beside, and behind you for an immersive experience. Utilize one of five sound modes optimized for movies, music, gaming, news, and sports.
feature_bullets: SOUNDBAR & SUBWOOFER: Sony 2.1 channel sound bar system with wireless subwoofer for optimized audio
VERTICAL SOUND ENGINE: Upscale audio to immersive surround with a max of 7.1.2ch with a single click
MATCH YOUR ENTERTAINMENT: 5 unique sound modes for enhanced movies, music, gaming, news, and sports.Bluetooth version 4.2
VOICE ENHANCEMENT: Isolates voices and amplifies them over the background noise for greater clarity
4K HDR QUALITY: Made for the latest home theatre formats to provide content with crystal clear audio
eARC TECHNOLOGY: Relay full-resolution sound with immersive audio formats like Dolby Atmos and DTS:X
BLUETOOTH STREAMING: Stream your favorite movies, shows, and music from your smartphone or tablet
WIRELESSLY CONNECT: Connect via Bluetooth to send audio to the slim soundbar and sub from anywhere
ONE-CABLE CONNECT: Send audio and control information from the TV using a single cable with HDMI ARC
IN THE BOX: HT-X9000F soundbar and subwoofer system with remote control, batteries, and HDMI cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
